text:
You can wrap `require_css` functions in if statements. This is often useful inside of custom modules.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#require-css>

Hi All, can someone tell me how can i output value from a multiselect field from HubDB to a template? i am using a dynamic page. when i try to access the field like this: `{{ dynamic_page_hubdb_row.course.name }}`  im not getting any results. any ideas?
